cards.rules_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield under your control, if it entered from a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
When this creature attacks, you mill 3 cards.

When this creature enters, create a tapped green legendary land token named Vhala'Ba-o that is every basic land type with “{2}{W}, {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color for each aura you control.”
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land enters the field under your control, create a green and red Forest's Rage aura token attached to target creature. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, create a 2/2 red and green Plant Dinosaur instead.

Whenever an Elf you control enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard a card, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Elf creature token.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a nontoken Elf: Elves you control gain +2/+0 and menace until end of turn.

Partner with Focalor, Speaker of Truth.
{3}, Fatigue Astor: Put a shelter counter on target permanent you control. You may play an additional land this turn. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Turn this creature face down. It becomes a 1/1 Rift Avatar with “Pay {1}: Turn this permanent face up. Activate only as a sorcery.” When this creature would untap, turn it face up.)[/i]
[i]Landfall[/i] — Predict 2. [i](Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play one of them this turn and it costs {1} less. At the beginning of your end step, shuffle all remaining cards exiled this way into your library.)[/i]

Partner with Astor, Herald of Focalor.
Focalor isn't a creature unless she has at least three shelter counters on her. [i](This creature has ward {X}, where X is the number of Shelter counters on it. Whenever this creature is targeted, remove a Shelter counter from it.)[/i]
Creatures you cast from exile enter with two additional +1/+1 counters on them.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, put a shelter counter on it. [i](This creature has ward {X}, where X is the number of Shelter counters on it. Whenever this creature is targeted, remove a Shelter counter from it.)[/i]

Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 2/2 white and green Bear creature token that enters with a shelter counter on it. [i](That permanent has ward {X}, where X is the number of Shelter counters on it. Whenever that permanent is targeted, remove a Shelter counter from it.)[/i]

Spiders your opponents control have protection from Samson.
Whenever Samson or another creature you control leaves the field, if it had counters on it, put those counters on up to one target permanent.
When Samson dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token.
Noolo can be your commander.
cards.special_text:
Noolo can be your commander.
Each turn, the first time you activate an ability of another nonland permanent you control, put a loyalty counter on Noolo.
[+1]: As an additional cost to activate this ability, sacrifice an artifact. Create two 1/1 white Elf creature tokens.
[0]: Draw a card, then create a Tuulvoke Crystal artifact token.
[-9]: Noncreature artifacts you control become 3/3 colorless Construct creature tokens in addition to their other types.

cards.rules_text:
Flying, haste
[i]Desperate[/i] — When this creature attacks, if you have no cards in hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Phoenix. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Vigilance
Whenever an ability of an Elf you control is activated, it gains +1/+1 until end of turn.
When this creature attacks, activated abilities of creatures you control cost {1} less until end of turn.
{1}{U}{U}: Untap another target Elf you control.

Enchanted creatures you control get +1/+0.
{2}, {T}, Exile your hand: Put X shelter counters on target creature you control, where X is half the number of cards you exiled, rounded up. At the beginning of your end step, return all cards exiled this way to your hand. [i](This creature has ward {X}, where X is the number of Shelter counters on it. Whenever this creature is targeted, remove a Shelter counter from it.)[/i]

This land is a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. [i]({T}: Add {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, or {G}.)[/i]
{2}{W}, {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color for each aura you control.

Enchanted creature has +1/+1.

{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You may play the exiled card until end of turn.

When Focalor enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and create a legendary emblem named Uvathkolsil's Lattice with “{5}: Exile target creature. Its controller distributes +1/+1 counters on creatures they control equal to its mana value and draws a card. Activate only once each turn and only if you control a permanent named Focalor, Lattice Maker.”
{2}: Predict 2. [i](Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play one of them this turn and it costs {1} less. At the beginning of your end step, shuffle all remaining cards exiled this way into your library.)[/i]
{4}, {T}: Proliferate.

{5}: Exile target creature. Its controller distributes +1/+1 counters on creatures they control equal to its mana value and draws a card. Activate only once each turn and only if you control a permanent named Focalor, Lattice Maker.

Flying
[i]Desperate[/i] — If you have no cards in hand, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
Sacrifice Kinkud: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn.
Exios' power is equal to the number of auras you control.
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{T}: Put a stun counter on target creature without a stun counter.

{1}{R}, Sacrifice this creature: Return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[i]Desperate[/i] — If you have no cards in hand, when this creature dies, you may Bestow {2}{R}. [i](If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, flying, and haste.

Enchant land
Enchanted land has “{2}{R}, {T}: Create a 2/1 red Phoenix creature token with flying and haste.”

Menace, haste
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
[i]Desperate[/i] — If you have no cards in hand, you may pay {1}{B} and sacrifice a creature. If you do, return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

Whenever an Elf you control enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
{B}, {T}: Discard a card from your hand, then draw a card. You lose 1 life.
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

Flying
When this creature attacks while saddled, it gains +X/+X where X is the total power of creatures that saddled it this turn.
Saddle 1

Vigilance
When this creature enters or attacks, you may pay {2}. If you do, you may return target Elf with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{2}, {T}: Copy target triggered or activated ability you control that isn't a mana ability. You lose 3 life.

Other Elf creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as you discarded a card this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Elf creature token.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}: Add two mana of any color for each colored mana from lands spent to activate this ability. Spend this mana only to cast your commander.

Skip your draw step.
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
Pay {B} and 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face-down. Put it into your hand at the beginning of your end step.

When this enchantment enters, choose a creature type.
Verbose Bonds is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Creatures of the chosen type you control get +1/+1.
Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white Kindred Spirit creature token which is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

When this creature enters, create two 1/1 white Elf creature tokens and lose 2 life.
[i]Desperate[/i] — {T}: If you have no cards in hand, draw a card and lose 1 life. Otherwise, discard a card and put two -1/-1 counters on target creature.

At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[i]Desperate[/i] — {T}: If you have no cards in hand, create two 1/1 white Elf creature tokens.

Discard a card, Sacrifice this card: Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
[i]Desperate[/i] — If you have no cards in hand, you may pay {3}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it and draw a card. You lose 2 life.

While this card is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return it to your hand.
When you discard this card, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

[i]Desperate[/i] — When Mulling Mystic enters, if you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.
{3}{U}: Create a token copy of target Elf you control except its an Illusion in addition to its other types and has “When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.”

When this creature enters, draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color and lose 1 life.

At the beginning of your end step, untap each creature you control.
{B}, Discard a card: Reveal the top card of your deck. Put it into your hand and you lose life equal to its mana value.

When this creature enters, you gain 1 life.
When this creature dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
[i]Desperate[/i] — {B}, {T}, Sacrifice this card: If you have no cards in hand, create a treasure token and draw a card.

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Elf creature token.
Whenever you discard your second card each turn, draw a card and gain 1 life.

{R}{G}: Adapt 2 [i](If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
When one or more +1/+1 counters are put on this creature, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for a land with a basic land type and put it on the battlefield tapped.

Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Insight in your graveyard. If you drew greater than three cards this way, pay {3} or discard cards equal to the difference.
A deck can have up to six cards named Accumulated Insight.

{1}, Fatigue Focalor's Truthspeaker: Fatigue target nonland permanent. [i](Turn this creature face down. It becomes a 1/1 Rift Avatar with “Pay {1}: Turn this permanent face up. Activate only as a sorcery.” When this creature would untap, turn it face up.)[/i]

{1}, Fatigue Focalor's Liebinder: Fatigue target creature. [i](Turn this creature face down. It becomes a 1/1 Rift Avatar with “Pay {1}: Turn this permanent face up. Activate only as a sorcery.” When this creature would untap, turn it face up.)[/i]
Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a +1 Longsword artifact equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +2/+1” and “Equip {2}”.

Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2}
Whenever you exile one or more a cards you control or from your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

All creatures you control with base power and toughness less than 3/3 have base power and toughness 3/3.

When this enchantment leaves the field, that opponent creates an X/X green and red Plant Dinosaur creature token, where X is the mana value of the exiled card plus 1.

When this creature enters, creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. Then, create a Monster Role token attached to each creature you control. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.)[/i]

I — Create two 1/1 white Elf creature token.
II — For each opponent exile target nonland permanent.
III — Draw a card for each creature you control with power 3 or less, then discard two cards.
